reference.title: Session
reference.shortdesc: A reference to the session being queried is given to the methods begin_search and end_search.

section.title: Properties
section.p: The date for the session. Dates are returned in the format YYYY-MM-DD (e.g., 1982-04-30).
The name of the session. Session name is returned as corpus.session.
Number of records in the session.
An array of string values providing all of the available tiers in the session.

section.title: Functions
section.p: Tells if the provided tierName is a grouped tier (e.g., Orthography, IPA Target/Actual) or not.
Return the record at the given index. Useful for cross-record searching. If index is less than zero or greater than the numberOfRecords this method will return null.
